resources.string: CREATE TABLE REVIEWS ( id integer primary key, heading String, description String, is_like integer, image_url String, latitude String, longitude String, review_date String, creation_date Date); CREATE TABLE PENDING_REVIEWS ( id integer primary key, heading String, description String, is_like integer, image_url String, image_path String, latitude String, longitude String, review_date, creation_date Date, errors String, status String, retries integer);
